channel.title: Basic on John's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Basic on John's Blog

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Greeting! This is an introduction post. This post tests the followings: Hero image is in the same directory as the post. This post should be at top of the sidebar. Post author should be the same as specified in author.yaml file.

item.title: Rich Content
item.description: This sample post tests the followings: Category, sub-category nesting in the sidebar. Hero image and other images are in images folder inside this post directory. Different media rendering like image, tweet, YouTube video, Vimeo video etc. Image Sample Tweet Sample “In addition to being more logical, asymmetry has the advantage that its complete appearance is far more optically effective than symmetry.” — Jan Tschichold pic.twitter.com/gcv7SrhvJb — Graphic Design History (@DesignReviewed) January 17, 2019 YouTube Video Sample Vimeo Video Sample
